name: EXTREME EXTERMINATION DEFENSE
description:
Splatter bugs while building and upgrading towers in this mashup of both vehicle combat simulators and tower defense games! Made in collaboration with Zenson Ng.

You can choose to play in the browser, but it's recommended to download and play the Windows build.
